ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We express our gratitude to the late Prof. Francisco Triana ex-Director of BIOMED-UC and to all members of this institute for their support. Our thanks go to Dr Guillermo Comach, Dr Gloria Sierra, Augusto Tarazon, Oscar Diaz, Noheliz Ojeda and Dr. Haydee Ochoa for the epidemiological information on dengue in Aragua and Carabobo state. Finally, we would like to thank Francisco Laguna for the support and valuable insights regarding the wavelet analysis. This work was supported by the Fondo Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnología e Innovación (FONACIT), grant 201100129, 201300201; and by the Coordinación de Aplicación de Fondos e Incentivos para el Desarrollo de Planes de Ciencia, Tecnología e Innovación, Organic Law of Science, Technology and Innovation (LOCTI), certification No DGCAFIDCTI/204–214–10, of the Venezuelan Ministry of Science, Technology and Innovation, Venezuela; and by the University Medical Center Groningen (UMCG), University of Groningen, Groningen, The Netherlands. MFVG and EFL received a grant from the UMCG, University of Groningen, Groningen, The Netherlands. AT and MEG thank the Netherlands Organization for Scientific Research (NWO) for a Travel Grant during 2017. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
